mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT VO.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM （ SELECT ZG.GROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID, ZG.GROUP_NAME AS GROUP_NAME, ZG.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, ZG.CREATOR AS CREATOR, ZG.LEVELS AS LEVELS, ZG.GROUP_IMG AS GROUP_IMG FROM ZZ_USER_GROUP ZUG LEFT JOIN ZZ_GROUP ZG ON ZG.GROUP_ID = ZUG.GROUP_ID WHERE ZG.ISCLOSE = '0' AND ZG.ISDELETE = '0' AND ZUG.USER_ID = #{id} ) VO WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) WHERE RN > #{start}
select count(*) from zz_user_group zug left join zz_group zg on zg.group_id = zug.group_id where zg.isclose = '0' and zg.isdelete = '0' and zug.user_id = #{ID}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MSG_SENDER ORDER BY SEND_TIME DESC) RN ,t.* FROM ( SELECT PHPM.MSG_ID AS MSG_ID, 'USER' AS TABLE_TYPE, PHPM.MSG_SENDER AS MSG_SENDER, PHPM.SEND_TIME AS SEND_TIME, PHPM.MSG AS MSG_CONTENT, PHPM.MSG_TYPE AS MSG_TYPE, PHPM.LEVELS AS LEVELS_USER FROM ZZ_PRIVATE_MSG PHPM WHERE PHPM.MSG_RECEIVER = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT PHGM.MSG_ID AS MSG_ID, 'GROUP' AS TABLE_TYPE, PHGM.MSG_SENDER AS MSG_SENDER, PHGM.SEND_TIME AS SEND_TIME, PHGM.MSG AS MSG_CONTENT, PHGM.MSG_TYPE AS MSG_TYPE, PHGM.LEVELS AS LEVELS_USER FROM ZZ_GROUP_MSG PHGM LEFT JOIN ZZ_USER_GROUP ZU ON PHGM.MSG_RECEIVER = ZU.GROUP_ID WHERE ZU.USER_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) t ) ) VO where rn =1 ORDER BY VO.SEND_TIME DESC
mapper.delete: delete from ZZ_USER_GROUP where GROUP_ID=#{groupId} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: select ID, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, CREATETIME from ZZ_USER_GROUP where ID = #{id}
select ID, USER_ID, GROUP_ID, CREATETIME from ZZ_USER_GROUP
mapper.insert: insert into ZZ_USER_GROUP(ID,USER_ID, GROUP_ID, CREATETIME) values (#{id},#{userId}, #{groupId}, #{createtime})
mapper.update:

MERGE INTO ZZ_USER_GROUP a USING (SELECT #{userId} as USER_ID,#{groupId} as GROUP_ID FROM DUAL) b ON (a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID and a.GROUP_ID = b.GROUP_ID and a.ISDELETE = '0') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.IS_TOP = #{topFlg}

MERGE INTO ZZ_USER_GROUP a USING (SELECT #{userId} as USER_ID,#{groupId} as GROUP_ID FROM DUAL) b ON (a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID and a.GROUP_ID = b.GROUP_ID and a.ISDELETE = '0') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.IS_MUTE = #{muteFlg}
